Well seeing From Previous issue here , you may have problem in the line with tf.device("/gpu:0"): , after searching , i found you need to set a particular variable called "allowed_soft_placement = true" as an parameter to tf.configProto, you can also check out following links

body_text:
Well seeing From Previous issue   here  , you may have  problem in the line with tf.device("/gpu:0"): , after searching , i found you need to set a particular variable called "allowed_soft_placement = true"  as  an parameter to  tf.configProto, you can also check out following  links
1
2
body:
Well seeing From Previous issue  [ here ]( https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/2292) , you may have  problem in the line `with tf.device("/gpu:0"):` , after searching , i found you need to set a particular variable called "allowed_soft_placement = true"  as  an parameter to  tf.configProto, you can also check out following  links  
[1](https://github.com/dpressel/rude-carnie/issues/24)
[2](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/2285)
